department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: undecorated on exterior; PR panel shows St. George on a white horse slaying a winged dragon with figure holding a cross at UL and figure with spear, shield and club at UR; Madonna and child flanked by 2 figures with swords on PL panel at top, with 3 figures wearing turbans and holding crosses below
title: Diptych with St. George and Madonna and Child
